FAQ: Entries for the banner's Frequently Asked Questions list and information modal
alwaysLock: Siempre bloquear a la parte inferior
Bloquea scrolling a la parte inferior de la pagina incluso cuando la pestaña esta escondida
anonymise: Muestra todos los posters como anónimo
boardExpiry: Number of days without new posts before a board is deleted
boardName: Name of the new board. Can contain up to 3 lowercase Latin letters or numbers.
boardTitle: Title of the new board, such as 'Animu & Mango'. Up to 100 characters long.
captcha: Ask users to complete a captcha for certain tasks like registration and thread creation
captchaPrivateKey: Key used for authenticating solved captchas server-side
captchaPublicKey: Key used for communicating with external captcha service
customCSS: User-defined CSS rules loaded on top of the selected theme
defaultCSS: Theme to load by default, when none is set by the client
defaultLang: Language pack to load by default
eightball: List of answers for the #8ball hash command. One answer per line. Can contain up to 100 answers and 2000 characters total.
expandAll: Expande todas las imagenes. Webm, PDF y MP3 y tu propio post no son afectados. Nuevos posts también son expandidos.
feedbackEmail: User feedback email to display in the top banner
forcedAnon: Disable user names, tripcodes and emails on posts
hideThumbs: Display a [Show] button in place of thumbnails
imageHover: Expansion de imagen al pasar el ratón
Muestra una previsualización de la imagen al pasar
imageRootOverride: If you wish to host images from a separate location like a CDN, enter the full root address here. Leave empty to use the default address. Example: 'https://images.meguca.org'
inlineFit: Expand images inside the parent post and resize according to setting
links: Add, remove or edit external >>>/4chan/-type references
mascotImage: Image to use as the mascot
mature: Inform the user the website contains mature content on first visit
maxSize: Maximum size of uploaded images in MB
name: Name
Name to attach to new posts
notice: Short informational message displayed at the top of the page
notification: Recibe notificaciones de escritorio cuando eres citado o un syncwatch esta a punto de comenzar
nowPlaying: La canción reproduciéndose ahora en r/a/dio y otra información sobre el stream en el banner de encima.
postInlineExpand: Inline linked post under the post link on click. When disabled, navigates to the linked post instead.
postPassword: Password used for image spoilering and reopening open posts after a disconnect
pruneBoards: Delete boards that have not had any new posts for N days
pruneThreads: Delete threads that have not had any posts in N days
relativeTime: Estampas de tempo relativas. Ex.: '1 hora atrás'
replyRight: Mueve el botón Responder a la derecha de la pagina
rootURL: Root URL of the imageboard. Required for some image search providers to work.
rules: Board rules to display in the rule modal window
salt: Salt for secure tripcode and mnemonic generation. Recommended to be at least 40 characters long.
sessionExpiry: Time in days until user accounts are automatically logged out
spoilers: Enable use of ** to spoiler blocks of text
staffTitle: Display your staff title in the post header
threadExpiry: Number of days without new posts before a thread is deleted
title: Board title
Short descriptive title of the board
toggleSpoiler: Activa spoiler en el post abierto
userBGImage: Imagen para usar como fondo personalizado
webmHover: Expansión de WebM al pasar el ratón
Muestra una previsualización del WebM al pasar. Requiere tener Expansion de imagen al pasar el ratón activado.
workMode: Esconde las imágenes y deshabilita el fondo personalizado.
workModeToggle: Esconde las imágenes y deshabilita el fondo personalizado.

ui.done: Import successfull. The page will now reload.
ui.searchTooltip: Filter threads by subject, body or board name encased in backslashes. Accepts Regular expressions.
ui.subject: Sujeto

banPage: You have been banned from /%s/ by %s for the following reason:
Your ban will expire on %s or in %s.
According to our server, your IP is %s.
